ygData.subject: Re: Rumors
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes it is but I can still break into the room easy with one other person of any class. Granted sometimes you die but the greater the risk the bigger the
ygData.messageBody:
Yes it is but I can still break into the room easy with one other person of
any class. Granted sometimes you die but the greater the risk the bigger the
reward.

Naeeldar

-----Original Message-----
From: Seali Baleno <seali@...>
To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Tuesday, January 18, 2000 12:44 PM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Rumors


>From: Seali Baleno <seali@...>
>
>JasonF <JasonF@...> said:
>
>>
>> I hear this a lot. "Man, did you see that 49/50 Necro soloing the
>Lord
>> room?" I've never seen it done, and no one that I know personally
>on Fennin
>> Ro has seen it done. I always hear words to the effect of "it
>just takes a
>> bit of strategy", but no one has every had any comment on what
>that strategy
>> might be.
>
>The "strategy" is being fixed in an upcoming patch. Basically, the
>room spawns with the lord and 2 boks most of the time. Necro
>waltzes into the room, screaming terrors one bok, charms the other
>bok, sic's it on the lord, and feigns death. Lord kills bok, is
>pretty hurt. Other bok comes back. Necro charms bok, sic's bok on
>lord, feigns death. Lord kills bok, has a sliver of health left.
>Necro, will full health and mana, stands up and kills lord easily.
>
>There you have it.
>
>Gaspode
>
